snippet: The time has come for us to admit that psychiatric diagnosis is too important to be left exclusively in the hands of psychiatrists.
abstract: Op-Ed article by psychiatrist Allen Frances contends that the upcoming fifth edition of the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders will introduce many new and unproven diagnoses that will result in a glut of unnecessary and harmful drug prescriptions; argues that the time has come to admit that the psychiatric manual is too important to be created by psychiatrists alone.
lead_paragraph: The time has come for us to admit that psychiatric diagnosis is too important to be left exclusively in the hands of psychiatrists.

keywords.value: Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders (Book)
